definitions.definition: A family of related ethnicities and languages primarily in Southern India , Northeast Sri Lanka , and parts of Pakistan and Bangladesh .
Any of the languages of these aboriginal peoples; Dravidic .

main_definition: A family of related ethnicities and languages primarily in Southern India , Northeast Sri Lanka , and parts of Pakistan and Bangladesh .
secondary_definitions: Any of the languages of these aboriginal peoples; Dravidic .

definitions.definition: A member of any of several aboriginal peoples of India and Sri Lanka thought to have spread in India before Aryan migration .

main_definition: A member of any of several aboriginal peoples of India and Sri Lanka thought to have spread in India before Aryan migration .
